sentences.en: Gruel is convenient to make in the morning for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 吃早饭时,做稀粥是很方便的.

sentences.en: He sat down before the fireplace to eat his gruel.
He was writing his report so attentively that he didn't know the rice gruel in the pot had boiled over.
sentences.cn: 他聚精会神地写报告,连锅里的稀饭煮溢了也不知道.

sentences.en: If he plays fool, he will get his gruel.
sentences.cn: 他干蠢事, 就会受到惩罚.

sentences.en: If he plays fool, he'll get his gruel.
sentences.cn: 他如果干蠢事, 就一定会受到惩罚.

sentences.en: In order not to lose face , Mr. Xu would not fetch the gruel himself.
sentences.cn: 他为了维护当老师的体面, 是不肯自己去打粥的.

sentences.en: Mrs. March gave the mother tea and gruel , and comforted her with promises of help, while she dressed the little baby as tenderly as if it had been her own.
sentences.cn: 马奇太太一边为做母亲的端茶递粥，一边安慰她，让她宽心，又像对待自己的亲生骨肉一样轻柔地为小宝宝穿上衣服。

sentences.en: Seven suitable gruel recuperations: The winter drinks sticks hardly.
sentences.cn: 七宜粥调养: 冬季饮食忌粘硬生冷.

sentences.en: The food was very simple - teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.
sentences.cn: 吃的食物非常简单,老师一天三顿喝小米稀粥.

sentences.en: The food was very simple-teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.

sentences.en: The maid , Wang Mah , came in with a bowl of bird's - nest gruel for him.
sentences.cn: 王妈捧着燕窝粥进来, 吴荪甫也没觉得.

sentences.en: There is rice gruel , braised diced pork, courgettes and hot steamed buns.
sentences.cn: 有米粥 、 焖肉 、 西葫芦和热馒头.

sentences.en: This was thin gruel for Sadat.
sentences.cn: 这对于萨达特来说是杯水车薪.

sentences.en: We Chinese always have gruel, eggs, milk and fried sticks for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我们中国人早上一般喝稀粥, 喝牛奶, 吃鸡蛋或者是油条.

sentences.en: We had gruel for the breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我们早餐吃的是麦片粥.

sentences.en: We serve soybean milk or rice gruel instead of coffee and juice.
sentences.cn: 我们供应豆浆或白米粥来代替咖啡和果汁.
